code: import React from'react';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import ShopItem from'./ShopItem';var ShopItems=function ShopItems(props){/** get selected Category name from redux */ /** inorder to list product item by category */var category=useSelector(function(state){return state.reducerNavigation.category;});/** PRODUCT LISTING */function viewCategory(category,item,catg){if(category===''){/** display all items */return React.createElement(ShopItem,{item:item});}else{if(category===catg.name){/** display selected Category items */return React.createElement(ShopItem,{item:item});}}}return React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,props.prod.map(function(catg){return catg.products.map(function(item){return viewCategory(category,item,catg);});}));};export default ShopItems;
